participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Humorous and laid-back, Emily enjoys light-hearted conversations and values friendships.
participant_1.background: I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. I love the Chainsmokers. My favorite movie is Django Unchained. I've kept my deployment from my parents. I love to read fantasy novels and poetry.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, Jake is driven by his interests and takes pride in his hobbies.
participant_2.background: My parents are proud of me for my athletic abilities and my choice of career. I don’t like music. I love a good stew, coffee, and creating content for my YouTube channel. I'm a terrible speller. I collect cat-themed items because they bring me joy and remind me of my favorite animal.

content.text: Hi! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! How about you?
I'm doing alright, thanks for asking. What are you up to today?
I'm just hanging out, creating content for my YouTube channel.
That's cool! What kind of content do you create?
I make videos about my favorite things, like cats and coffee.
Oh, that sounds fun! I love cats and coffee too.
What's your favorite kind of cat?
I love all kinds of cats, but I'm especially fond of tabby cats.
Tabby cats are great! I have a tabby cat named Mittens.
I love Mittens! What's your favorite kind of coffee?
I love black coffee, but I also like flavored coffees like caramel macchiatos.
I love caramel macchiatos too! What's your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Great Gatsby.
That's a great book! I love the writing style.
Me too! It's so beautiful and lyrical.
I'm glad we have similar taste in books.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who shares your interests.
Definitely! What else do you like to do for fun?
I like to watch funny movies, listen to music, and read fantasy novels.
We have a lot in common! I love funny movies and fantasy novels too.
That's great! We should be friends.
I'd love that!
Me too!
